name: Thinkrolls
description: Thinkrolls are the 26 smart characters in this award-winning app that is part physics platformer, part logic puzzle game and 100% irresistible for kids 3-11. Learn about force, acceleration, buoyancy, heat, elasticity and gravity while navigating your Thinkrolls characters through a seamless maze! Get it now and let your little geniuses amaze you with their brain power and problem solving skills! The goal is to solve the puzzles and roll through the end of the maze where a new Thinkroll waits to be unlocked and lead the next quest!
